articles.description: Saturday's Manchester Derby was shrouded in controversy, with Manchester City believing Bruno Fernandes' equaliser should have been ruled out for an offside against Marcus Rashford
articles.content:
Manchester United have trolled rivals Manchester City after a controversial equaliser allowed Erik ten Hag's side to mount a comeback against their rivals on Saturday.

articles.title: Hockey World Cup 2023: Can India repeat historic 1975 win? - BBC
articles.description: Experts say the team, buoyed by home support, stands a good chance to bring home the cup.
articles.content:
The last time India won the hockey World Cup, things were quite different.
It was nearly half a century ago and Indira Gandhi was prime minister when India lifted the cup in March 1975 in Kuala Lump… [+5504 chars]
